sectionText: The class meets twice per week: once on Mondays, and a second time to attend performances and/or exhibitions at Krannert Center for the Performing Arts and/or Krannert Art Museum.  Event dates will vary. Admission to all events will be provided without charge to students enrolled in the course. The class meets in Room 4-506 (Ensemble A, Level 2) at Krannert Center for the Performing Arts, 500 S. Goodwin Avenue, Urbana.
